EmailTemplate.subject: Build Your Data Lake at #Strataconf Santa Clara 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
O'REILLY STRATA Making Data Work
February 11-13, 2013 <https://en.oreilly.com/strata2014/public/regwith/pivotal20> SEE YOU NEXT WEEK AT STRATA Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Are you ready to make the move from data silos to a data lake? Build on the business culture of local analytic solutions and utilize Big Data technologies to remove the cost constraints of data storage and movement.
Pivotal Business Data Lake <http://bit.ly/1byZBLB>, an evolution in data infrastructure, can do this in a single environment. The move from data silos to data lakes will accelerate data-driven insights, app development, iteration and time to value.
Learn more about Pivotal and The Business Data Lake <http://bit.ly/1byZBLB> next week at Strata Santa Clara, we will be in booth #201.
Be sure to attend one of our sessions next Thursday, February 13.
- 9:00 am - Kaushik Das, Senior Principal Data Scientist presents "Data Science and Smart Systems: Creating the Digital Brain" <http://ow.ly/tePTF>
- 10:40 am - NYSE, Capgemini, and Kaiser will be on a panel, "Business Data Lake: An Evolution in Data Infrastructure" <http://ow.ly/tatw7> - 4:00 pm - Data Scientists Ian Huston, Alexander Kagoshima, and Noelle Sio presents "Driving the Future of Smart Cities - How to Beat the Traffic" <http://ow.ly/tau6g>
REGISTER <https://en.oreilly.com/strata2014/public/regwith/pivotal20>
We look forward to seeing you next week!
The Pivotal Team O'Reilly Strata Santa Clara Convention Center February 11-13, 2014
We invite you to use the promotional code Pivotal20 to receive 20% off your registration. REGISTER <https://en.oreilly.com/strata2014/public/regwith/pivotal20>
